Posts.Content: Feb 4, 2012 06:24PM Kupuna52 wrote: Thanks to those who confirmed that nausea was experienced from their rad treatments.  I have only had 2 treatments so far andit has zapped my eneergy plus nausea, along with ache in the area treated. Really has taken me by surprise because I sailed thru chemo with hardly any SE other than hair loss from with Adriamycin and Cytoxan and numbness in my toes with Taxol.  Also, thanks to everyone for recommendations of creams that have worked during their treatments.  I will be seeking several this weekend while my energy is up because rads are only Mondays thru Fridays.
Posts.Title: best creams for radiation pattibear FireKracker
